promo.title: Sensors Multitool: the ultimate tool for your Android Smartphone's sensors.
promo.line1: Information about all sensors supported by your phone
promo.line2: Support for show information of WIFI networks and GPS
promo.line3: All data accompanied by graphics in real time
promo.line4: Collects on a single application: altimeter, metal detector, barometer, compass, thermometer...

settings.desc1: Support for all Android sensors: gyroscope, compass, barometer, light sensor...
settings.desc2: Features of each of the sensors on your smartphone.
settings.desc3: Real time information of the data obtained by Sensors.
settings.desc4: All data from the network which you are connected, intensity, and information about your Smartphone in the network.
settings.desc5: You could see your geographical position, the altitude at which you are, and the status of the satellites.
settings.desc6: A clean and simple interface following the guidelines of Material Design.
settings.desc7: Complete Graphs that let you view the data collected by the sensors.

how.title: How it works
how.desc: Explanatory video about Sensors Multitool working.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Contact us for any report or suggestion.

help.desc: Help us continue to make and improve free applications.
